design_philosophy.core_principle: Adaptive interfaces that work with ADHD brain patterns, not against them
design_philosophy.accessibility_priority: ADHD-specific accommodations beyond standard WCAG 2.1 AA compliance

navigation_model.pattern: Tab-based navigation with visual progress indicators
navigation_model.adhd_optimization: Consistent placement, predictable patterns, minimal navigation depth

core_sections.purpose: Quick energy check-in and task recommendations
Adaptive focus periods with break management
core_sections.navigation_priority: Primary tab - central to app value

screen_specifications.purpose: Quick daily energy and focus state assessment
screen_specifications.layout_description: Large visual energy selector with 5 color-coded options
key_elements: One-tap selection with immediate visual feedback
adhd_optimizations: No cognitive load - pure visual selection
Clear visual hierarchy with single focal point

screen_specifications.purpose: Personalized task recommendations based on current energy state
screen_specifications.layout_description: Card-based layout with 3-5 suggested tasks, each with visual complexity indicators
key_elements: Estimated focus time with visual representations

screen_specifications.purpose: Flexible focus sessions with ADHD-aware break patterns
screen_specifications.layout_description: Large circular progress indicator with ambient background changes
key_elements: Visual progress ring with color transitions
Current task display with context switching prevention
Adaptive break suggestions based on focus quality

screen_specifications.purpose: Kanban-style task management optimized for ADHD visual processing
screen_specifications.layout_description: Three-column board (Ready/Doing/Done) with colorful task cards
key_elements: Drag-and-drop task cards with visual feedback
Color-coded priority and energy level indicators
Quick task creation with voice input
accessibility_features: Alternative list view for screen readers

gesture_design.primary_actions: Large touch targets (48dp minimum) with clear visual feedback
gesture_design.adhd_considerations: Consistent gesture vocabulary, accidental action prevention

feedback_systems.immediate_feedback: Visual state changes within 100ms of interaction
feedback_systems.progress_indication: Clear visual progress for all operations >1 second

error_prevention.recovery_patterns: Easy undo with clear visual indicators
error_prevention.frustration_reduction: Alternative input methods for difficult tasks

iconography.style: Outlined icons with optional fill states
iconography.adhd_optimization: Clear symbolism, consistent metaphors, reduced cognitive load

device_adaptation.accessibility_scaling: Supports up to 200% text scaling with layout reflow

orientation_handling.portrait_primary: Optimized for one-handed use during focus sessions
orientation_handling.landscape_support: Enhanced visual space for task board and analytics
